name: LD29 - It Came From... Beneath!!
description:
It Came From... Beneath!!

A game made within 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 29 game jam. The theme was "Beneath the Surface."

Eat the people, grow large, and fly!

More details about the experience can be read in my Ludum Dare 29 Postpartum blog post.

Downloads for your computer are below. You can also play the game in your browser.
